summary: JPMorgan Chase is a huge American bank and finance company, the largest in the U.S. and the world by market value. It was formed in 2000 when two big banks, Chase Manhattan and J.P. Morgan & Co., merged. The company offers many financial services like investment banking, asset management, and retail banking. It has a long history, dating back to 1799. JPMorgan Chase is one of the most important global banks, but it has also faced criticism for its risky business practices and legal issues.
title: JPMorgan Chase
